reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Women for Democracy and Equality, Stronger Participation of Women in Political Decision-Making

description.narrative: The overall objective of the action is to empower women in the decision-making positions within political parties and the Parliament of Serbia. For the most effective realisation of its objectives the 20-month long action will be implemented through a seri es of 11 core activities structured in a way that:- a series of public events (1 women?s pre-election convention 2 public hearings 3 public round table discussions) will provide opportunities to attract attention of the general public on the importance of greater participation and influence of women in politics, - 3 parliamentary capacity building seminars will facilitate subsequent practical implementation of acquired knowledge and skills,- 1 study visit of a selected group of women MP to Finland will all ow for the skills and knowledge gained on the seminars to be applied to concrete examples,- the initiative to establish a cross-party caucus group on gender equality (to be presented at the closing conference) will contribute to mainstreaming of gender equ ality policies and facilitate peer learning and building lasting alliances among particip,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
